name: ROBO Trouble
description:
IMPORTANT NOTE : !!! THE BROWSER VERSION IS HIGHLY RECOMMENDED , THE DOWNLOADABLE VERSION DO NOT HAVE MUSIC AND POST PROCESSING  !!!ROBO Trouble :

robo trouble is a pixel art puzzle platformer made for the "tafra" game jam in under 48 hours .

controls : 

Move : WASD , arrows , controller analog , controller arrows 

jump : space , controller button 2 

Restart : R

Development info : 

made with unity engine , pixel art made in aseprite ,  sfxr for some of the sound effects

used mix and jam project tamplate for the character movement ( github )

some sound effects : "transform sound" is from this website : ( mixkit ) 

the font inside the game is from this website : ( 1001fonts )

every single other thing was completely made from scratch by me .
